text: Memory is the fourth studio album by American band Vivian Girls. Released in 20 September 2019 under Polyvinyl Record Co., it's their first release since their break up in 2014. ==Critical reception== Memory was met with universal acclaim reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 81, based on 12 reviews. ==Track listing== Adapted from AllMusic ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |+Chart performance for Memory |- ! Chart (2019) ! Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Vivian Girls albums Category:Polyvinyl Record Co. albums
title: Memory (Vivian Girls album)
